scripts.scripts: cat $(find js/ -name '*.js' | sort) > build/scripts.js && uglifyjs build/scripts.js > build/scripts.min.js && rm build/scripts.js
scripts.styles:
find css/ -name '*.css' -exec cat {} \; | tr -d '	
' | tr -s ' ' > build/styles.min.css
scripts.build: npm run scripts && npm run styles
